header.subject: Hello I'm the personal attorney to late Mr Robert So Sorry for my short coming to your privacy ,I have a file bearing the same name as you here in my office , which is a beneficiary of USD$9.5 Million deposited in a Bank in the UK . your name was used as the next beneficiary before his demise. He Died on a ghastly Auto Accident alongside his wife and only daughter.i want to stand you for the claims please kindly contact me for us to claim and transfer the funds to you and for more details on getting the aforesaid fund.
